headline: Assessing Aon (AON) Valuation After Leadership Shift And Expanded Ukraine War‑Risk Efforts
summary: Aon (AON) is back in focus after appointing Joe Peiser as CEO of Risk Capital, a move tied to its push on capital efficient risk solutions and its continued role in Ukraine war risk coverage. See our latest analysis for Aon. Aon’s recent leadership reshuffle around Risk Capital comes as the shares trade at US$314.49, with a 30 day share price return of an 8.73% decline and a 1 year total shareholder return of an 18.73% decline, suggesting momentum has been fading despite solid earnings...
